mapper.select: select b.BGoalTitle as "BGoalTitle",to_char(r.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", to_char(r.endDate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endDate", d.completeTime as "isComplete",m.mGoalTitle as mGoalTitle, r.bRecordNum as "bRecordNum" from BTMGoal b inner join BTMRecord r on b.bGoalNum = r.bGoalNum full join (select btmRecordNum,count(completeTime) as completeTime from dayRecord group by btmRecordNum) d on r.BRecordNum = d.BTMRecordNum inner join MidGoal m on b.mGoalNum = m.mGoalNum where r.memberId = #{userid} order by r.startDate desc

select b.BGoalTitle as "bGoalTitle",to_char(r.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", to_char(r.endDate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endDate", d.achieve as "achievePercent",m.mGoalTitle as mGoalTitle from BTMGoal b inner join (select startDate,endDate,bGoalNum,BRecordNum,memberId from BTMRecord where sysdate >= startDate and sysdate <= endDate) r on b.bGoalNum = r.bGoalNum full join (select btmRecordNum,sum(achieve) as achieve from dayRecord group by btmRecordNum) d on r.BRecordNum = d.BTMRecordNum inner join MidGoal m on b.mGoalNum = m.mGoalNum where r.memberId = #{memberId} order by r.startDate desc
select to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", achieve from DayRecord where BTMRecordNum = #{BTMRecordNum}

select p.dcontents as "dContents",to_char(p.startTime,'yyyy-mm-dd-hh24-mi') as "startTime",to_char(p.startTime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi') as "schedulePlanStart", to_char(p.endTime,'yyyy-mm-dd-hh24-mi') as "endTime",to_char(p.endTime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi') as "schedulePlanEnd",p.dayPlanNum as "dayPlanNum", b.bRecordNum as "btmRecordNum", to_char(d.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", b.startDate as "BTMstartDate", b.endDate as "BTMendDate", d.DayRecordNum as "dayRecordNum" from DayPlan p inner join (select DayRecordNum,btmRecordNum, startDate from DayRecord) d on d.DayRecordNum = p.DayRecordNum inner join (select bRecordNum,to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate from BTMRecord where memberId = #{userid}) b on d.btmRecordNum = b.bRecordNum

select p.dcontents as "dContents", to_char(p.startTime,'yyyy-mm-dd-hh24-mi') as "startTime", to_char(p.startTime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi') as "schedulePlanStart", to_char(p.endTime,'yyyy-mm-dd-hh24-mi') as "endTime",to_char(p.endTime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi') as "schedulePlanEnd", p.dayPlanNum as "dayPlanNum", to_char(p.startTime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", to_char(p.endTime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endDate", d.DayRecordNum as "dayRecordNum" from DayPlan p inner join DayRecord d on p.DayRecordNum = d.DayRecordNum inner join BTMRecord b on b.bRecordNum = d.btmRecordNum inner join (select memberId from calendar where calendarNum = 7) c on c.memberId = #{userid} where b.bRecordNum = 1
select sum(achieve) from DayRecord where BTMRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum} group by BTMRecordNum
mapper.insert: insert into DayPlan values(#{dayPlanNum}, to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'),to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'),#{dContents},'Y',#{dayRecordNum})
mapper.select: select r.dayRecordNum from DayRecord r inner join calendar c on c.calendarNum = r.calendarNum inner join member m on c.memberId = m.userId where to_char(r.startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{startDate} and m.userid = #{userId}

select d.achieve as achieve from (select bRecordNum from btmRecord where memberid = #{userId} and to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd') >= to_date(to_char(startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') and to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd') <= to_date(to_char(endDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')) b inner join (select sum(achieve) as achieve,BTMRecordNum from dayRecord group by BTMRecordNum) d on b.bRecordNum = d.BTMRecordNum
mapper.update: update DayRecord set achieve = #{achieve} where btmRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum} and to_date(to_char(startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd')

update DayRecord set achieve = #{achieve}, completeTime = to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'),'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') where btmRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum} and to_date(to_char(startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd')
mapper.select: select achieve from DayRecord d inner join calendar c on d.calendarNum = c.calendarNum inner join member m on c.memberid = m.userid where to_date(to_char(d.startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd') and m.userid = #{userId}

select d.btmRecordNum as "btmRecordNum" from DayRecord d inner join btmRecord b on d.btmRecordNum = b.bRecordNum inner join member m on b.memberId = m.userId where to_date(to_char(d.startDate,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{startDate} and m.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update BTMGoal set BCLEAR = 'Y' where BGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where bRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum})
mapper.select: select count(bGoalNum) as "totalNum" from BTMGoal where mGoalNum = (select mGoalNum from BTMGoal where bGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where BRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum}))
select count(bGoalNum) as "ClearNum" from BTMGoal where mGoalNum = (select mGoalNum from BTMGoal where bGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where BRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum})) and BClear = 'Y'
mapper.update: update MIDGoal set MClear = 'Y'where mGoalNum = (select mGoalNum from BTMGoal where bGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where BRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum}))
mapper.select: select count(mGoalNum) from MidGoal where tGoalNum = (select tGoalNum from MidGoal where mGoalNum = (select mGoalNum from BTMGoal where bGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where BRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum}))) and MClear = 'Y'
mapper.update: update TopGoal set tClear = 'Y' where tGoalNum = (select tGoalNum from MidGoal where mGoalNum = (select mGoalNum from BTMGoal where bGoalNum = (select bGoalNum from BTMRecord where BRecordNum = #{btmRecordNum})))
